answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I found some sample contracts and other documents about LED conversion which you might find helpful.
Below is a RFP from Vermont regarding their LED Technical Assistant Program.
www.veic.org/.../VEIC_Streetlighting_RFP_Final_7-15-10_2.sflb.ashx
This is a sample LED Plan from Pittsburgh.
http://www.city.pittsburgh.pa.us/district8/assets/pgh_LED_plan.pdf
I have also included a generic sample LED Conversion contract.
http://contracts.onecle.com/sco/mti.sea.1999.12.30.shtml
The article below is a write up from the City of Clearwater, FL describing their experiences with LED conversion.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/14619/LED_Bulb_Conversion
Finally, this spreadsheet includes a comparison of LED Conversion price points from various vendors.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/302908/LED_Modeling_Comparison
I hope these help!
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org

author: James Prosser
text: We are looking for sample contracts for financing energy management/conservation contracts based on savings for the new energy/lighting systems
title: Energy conservation contracts
